item.title: Blazor Generic Components
item.description: Blazor Generic Components We will explore a Blazor generic component that can be used for performing CRUD (Create, Read, Update, Delete) operations on a list of items. This component is designed to provide a reusable and efficient solution for displaying and managing data in a Blazor application. Blazor: Blazor is a web framework that allows developers to build interactive web UIs using C# instead of JavaScript. It enables full-stack development with .
